title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 600.2 - Penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 600.2 - Penalties

State Regulations

Violation of the rules and regulations promulgated herein
shall be an offense punishable by a fine not exceeding $250 or by imprisonment
not to exceed 30 days or by both such fine and imprisonment; except that the
violation of any rule or regulation relating to the transportation of
explosives class A or B shall be a misdemeanor, punishable by a fine not
exceeding $2,500 or by imprisonment for a term not to exceed one year or by
both such fine and imprisonment. Violations of any rule or regulation governing
or regulating traffic on that portion of the bridge within the territorial
limits of the United States of America shall be a traffic infraction as that is
defined in the Vehicle and Traffic Law of the State of New York and shall be
punishable as such. Notes

600.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
